title: Ticket #2371: document new config knob SHADOW_RUN_UNKNOWN_USER_JOBS
description:
The version history item for the "new" config knob appears in the 7.7.0 version history, but ticket #2004 says that the fix went into 7.6.1. So, there are potentially 2 items that need to be checked/finished:

  1. identify where the version history item should be, and perhaps move it to the right place, or at least identify in the 7.7.0 version history if the item was meant to go in another release.

  2. document the variable in the huge list. The file is doc/admin-man/config.tex.
remarks:
2011-Aug-22 15:18:23 by tstclair:
pushing to 7.6.4 b/c .3 release is soon.

2011-Oct-19 11:20:46 by smoler:
Tim, just place a quick defn here in this ticket, and I'll get it into the manual. This task needs to be finished off instead of just forgotten.

2011-Oct-20 08:02:28 by tstclair:
It allows for the jobs to be run as user nobody if submitted via a user who is not known on the schedd, default is false.
check_ins:

2011-Oct-20 11:38   Check-in [27917]: Document config knob (which was new in 7.6.1) SHADOW_RUN_UNKNOWN_USER_JOBS ===GT=== #2004 ===GT=== #2371 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
